mapper.sql: PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, DISCRIPTION, LABEL, FIELD, RATE, PARENTID, TYPE_ID, CREATEDTM, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDTM, UPDATEUSER, STATUS, PRICE, UNIT
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO,
FROM QMCB.T_PRODUCT WHERE TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ROWNUM <= #{page}*#{pageSize}) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO >= (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1
mapper.insert: insert into QMCB.T_PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, DISCRIPTION, LABEL, FIELD, RATE, PARENTID, TYPE_ID, CREATEDTM, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDTM, UPDATEUSER, STATUS, PRICE, UNIT ) values (#{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{typeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatedtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update QMCB.T_PRODUCT
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCRIPTION = #{discription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIELD = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UPDATEDTM = #{updatedtm,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
